name: Patryk Zaslawski

With over 8 years in software engineering, my skills include setup and configuration of **AEM**, content migration, and performance optimization to ensure seamless user experiences. I excel in integrating third-party systems, implementing effective solutions, and maintaining high standards of quality in deliverables. My proficiency in frontend frameworks such as **React** and **Vue**, paired with solid communication, collaboration, and time management abilities, empowers me to contribute effectively in fast-paced environments while fostering a culture of accountability and a desire to learn.
